contentBody.headline: Cost-Effectiveness and TCO
contentBody.body:
Cost-Effectiveness and TCO

FlashBlade's architecture is designed to minimize overhead and optimize storage capacity, ensuring that customers get the most out of their investment. The Evergreen model allows for seamless, non-disruptive upgrades, further reducing long-term costs. This cost-effectiveness is a significant advantage for you as it helps you deliver value to your customers while maintaining competitive pricing.
